channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @froomkin @maggieNYT Funny how she has opinions of what’s in a source’s head, but her colleague Peter Baker has no opinions as to which candidate will be best for the country.

Your reminder that not taking responsibility for one’s inevitable consequences is central to the American legal, economic, and political order. https://t.co/fTfL4T9JJJ
That this is at radical odds with the basic Talmudic principles I learned as a ninth grade yeshiva student explains my ongoing cognitive dissonance.
@RokhlK @Heebmagazine Could “Forest Hills Collegiate” have been “Jewish” in the way “Forest Hills High” was when Simon and Garfunkel attended?
@InfantaRaquel I don’t think I was pirating digital files before he was born, but I was using the Internet to facilitate the trading of cassette tapes of bootleg sound recordings.
@trekonomics Oy!

@ChipJake @Heebmagazine That’s how it looks. It’s on my list of things to investigate.
@ChipJake @Heebmagazine They should at least upgrade to GPT-3.

Has anyone ever fact-checked the claim, attributed to @Heebmagazine, that Drake attened a Jewish day school? Does anyone know which school it was?
@Heebmagazine The Chicago Jewish News as always totally unhelpful in this regard. https://t.co/y4Y6dmMH4a
@AsafShaloo @kampeas Going to remind everyone that this antisemitic conspiracy theory seems to have resulted in at least one act of antisemitic violence. https://t.co/JeRPmpfFkT
@DBashIdeas @PrincetonUPress Strong recommendation that you get the Bhagavad Gita biography next year.
Get yourselves a sales team that can sell laxative ads in a magazine for kids. https://t.co/7JmjE8AlDF
Slowly closing in on the actual power of "omnipotent" Jewish deity. Strong enough to bring down a fragile coalition, not strong enough to prevent Nazi genocide. Good to know. https://t.co/1DTL9GLOD1
@DBashIdeas Worked for Rava and Ravina…..
@raggedmouths @MAdryaelTong One can dream.
@raggedmouths @MAdryaelTong How is Paul more Jewish than Jesus?

@trekonomics I suspect he tried to mansplain to his daughter one times too many and she wasn’t having any more of it. It might have worked if they were still married and Mom came to Dad’s defense.
@trekonomics Absent a united parental front, a father’s only superpower is unrepentant kvelling.
@ThatRabbiCohen יום הולדת שמח! https://t.co/08GWoAm9m4
@froomkin Has the Post announced new op ed hires?

The lines between being too stupid to consider other people, too wounded psychologically to consider other people, and too evil to consider other people really don’t make much a difference at the end of the day.
@typolad As someone who is not an audiophile, I’ve been happy with cheap headphones in the $25 range. Happy to send you a link.

@bruces I’ve been waiting for Love Me Do to be remade by Dick Nixon and the Kennedy Brothers since reading the earliest articles on digitize audiovisual synthesis in the Whole Earth Review 30+ years ago.
@trekonomics What’s the current rate? Happy to chip in for your GoFundMe to make you an aristocrat!
@rmneiss Go with both and you only need 400 words on each prong of your think piece.

@MAdryaelTong I see them as akin to Elphantine texts — they reflect the history of Jews and Jewish writing, they shed light into how Jewishness and Judaism was understood at the time, but they’re not a direct contribution to the body of Jewish thought or Judaism.
@rmneiss Their insecurity at not being Christian enough for today’s GOP after the rejection of Eric Cantor?
@jh_swanson The interesting question is whether it provides more or less funding for Yiddish culture than does the Swedish government, which considers Yiddish a minority language.
